title: Scholarship query
content: Do we compulsory need to have union bank account for scholarship money or we can link any bank account

comments.body: Union Bank account is mandatory. I'm assuming it's because of the tie-up college has that decreases some processing fee
It's created during Pessat admission time itself
Worked with different branch UBI for me.
Yes, there is a branch in PES, We need an account there and nowhere else.  Actually, during admission time, the parent's PAN card details are asked to create this bank account. :)
Does any union bank branch work, or is it a particular one?
